metaTitle: Weekly metrics video summaries for SaaS | Rendivia
metaDescription: Automatically turn weekly product metrics into branded video summaries using a simple API. Deterministic output, webhooks, and brand profiles.

hero.headline: Weekly metrics videos for SaaS products
hero.subheadline: Automatically turn weekly product metrics into branded video summaries using an API.
hero.supportLine: Turn reports, dashboards, and weekly recaps into MP4 videos - automatically.

problem.title: Why metrics dashboards aren't enough
bullets: Users don't log in every week to interpret charts.
Email and PDF reports are ignored or skimmed.
Key insights get lost without a clear narrative.
Manual video creation doesn't scale with customer count.

solution.title: Turn metrics into video - automatically
bullets: Schedule a weekly job (cron) to fetch your metrics.
Send the metrics to the /render endpoint with a template id.
We render an MP4 asynchronously and reliably.
Receive a webhook when the video is ready, then deliver it to users.

outputBullets: Brand logo, colors, and typography applied
Charts and counters generated from your metrics
Webhook includes output URL and render metadata

steps.title: Pick a template
steps.body: Choose a versioned template like weekly-summary-v1 to keep output deterministic.

steps.title: Send data
steps.body: POST your weekly metrics as JSON to /render using your API key.

steps.title: Render async
steps.body: We queue the job, render at scale, and retry safely on transient failures.

steps.title: Receive the result
steps.body: Get a webhook with the MP4 URL when the render completes.

benefits.title: Benefits
bullets: Higher engagement than dashboards or PDFs
Clear, consistent narrative around key metrics
Deterministic output you can trust in production
